featured.text: Then they wanted to put him in jail and charged him with violation of law for climbing the building without a permit.
My father-in-law is coming to visit us next week.
Requirements for a 14-day non-visa entry are: passport good for at least six months, confirmed onward ticket within 14 days, no violation of law recorded.
If you _____ a traffic law, such as drinking and driving, you may not drive for some time.

definition.zh_def: 法律；規則或原則，用於規範社會行為。
definition.en_def: A system of rules and guidelines, usually enforced through institutions, that governs behavior within a society.
definition.example: The law requires all drivers to wear seat belts while driving.
